data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Southampton, Bermuda to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Southampton, Bermuda

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 4,258 people in the state of Southampton who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Southampton unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Southampton, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 1,700 believers in Southampton to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 4,800 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 1,700 believers in Southampton.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,700 believers in Southampton that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
